<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Terror Bird](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1334)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Common terror birds, also known as axe beaks, are notable hunters. On their own, they use their great speed to catch prey unawares. In a flock, they can swarm larger beasts like aurochs and take them down with overwhelming numbers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Terror Bird](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1334)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 264</row>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +10 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing plus tearing clutch

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)

**Sprint** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** The terror bird Strides three times in a straight line.

**Tearing Clutch**   The terror bird's powerful beak can tear through flesh. On a successful beak Strike, the target takes 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). This bleed damage increases to 1d4 on a critical hit.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png">Diatryma</title>

These smaller kin of terror birds sport dark feathers and stand around 6 to 7 feet tall—smaller than terror birds, but no less ferocious. Diatrymas are mostly found in drier regions, where their small, orange beaks have earned them the nickname “dagger beaks.” Diatrymas are 1st-level creatures akin to terror birds with the [weak adjustment](/Rules.aspx?ID=791).
</aside>
